entry.title: $2500 // Brownstone Beauty - 2.5 Bedroom
entry.content:
Welcome to Saint Francis Place in the heart of Crown Heights Brooklyn. A modern and airy 2.5 bedroom, 1 kitchen and 1 full bathroom on the 3rd floor of a perfectly maintained Brownstone. Natural sunlight in each room, beautiful hardwood floors, and a 2018 renovated kitchen and bathroom. Even with all the upgrades, this home still has its original woodwork and traditional details

Steps from the 2,3,4,5,S trains at Franklin Ave, along with several restaurants, grocery stores and laundry /dry cleaning options.

Heat and Hot water included. No smoking or pets.
